title: graduatesurvey
author: graduatesurvey
content: Hi all: we are graduate students doing research regarding bitcoin and crypto, and would be very grateful for your help in taking our survey here: https://mit.co1.qualtrics.com/jfe/form/SV_3y11fzLc2Gesr66The survey poses some background questions and asks you about your preferences; it takes about 10 minutes to complete. We also offer some small monetary compensation for your time.If you have any questions, please message us or email binary_option_survey@mit.edu.

comments.author: coupable
comments.body: How much you will give if i complete the survey? 10 minutes is a long time Bro for a survey just for help.

comments.author: LoyceV
comments.body: Can you switch to a privacy friendly webhost? Many Bitcoin users aren't willing to compromise share their IP-address.I get this in Tor browser:QuoteAccess DeniedYou don't have permission to access "http://mit.co1.qualtrics.com/jfe/form/SV_3y11fzLc2Gesr66" on this server.Reference #18.d66656b8.1654014287.5ecb704e

comments.author: edgycorner
comments.created_time: May 31, 2022, 07:14:26 PMLast edit: May 31, 2022, 07:24:56 PM by edgycorner
comments.body: Quote from: coupable on May 31, 2022, 04:11:43 PMHow much you will give if i complete the survey? 10 minutes is a long time Bro for a survey just for help.They aren't paying directly, to prevent any kind of abuse to reap that reward by botting. Thus keeping response limited to humans only.They do have a lottery tho, but only like 3 people will win. 10% of participants might get 5~10 USD worth amazon gift card(depends upon your response)I took the survey, it seems like a study on how people take risks and their socioeconomic status.Probably trying to find some kind of relation between these two and a few other variables(like your education, portfolio, etc)Quote from: LoyceV on May 31, 2022, 04:26:32 PMCan you switch to a privacy friendly webhost? Many Bitcoin users aren't willing to compromise share their IP-address.I get this in Tor browser:It worked fine on my private digitalocean proxy.
